title: Customer goes hands-on with Mac Studio days before Apple’s new desktop hits stores
content:
Apple will start selling the new Mac Studio this Friday. Fortunately, a lucky customer was able to get the new desktop a few days before its official release. With that, he shared some photos of this new pro-machine.

more…

The post Customer goes hands-on with Mac Studio days before Apple’s new desktop hits stores appeared first on 9to5Mac.
